messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] hot dog play date thingie
messages.msgSnippet: THe boy was anticipating a museum trip. Museum trip cancelled and other arrangements made without his consultation. Boy didn t want to go. ******** I quoted
messages.messageBody:
THe boy was anticipating a museum trip.

Museum trip cancelled and other arrangements made without his
consultation.

Boy didn't want to go.
********
I quoted that cause it was convenient and short <g>

I would have told the other Mom that I needed to check with my boy before we
changed the plans.
I want to admit that I am guilty of doing similar things. Sometimes my
feelings are more important to me right at that time. This is not something that's
OK, please don't get me wrong. I have done it in the past but don't plan on
doing it in the future. I'm not perfect but I try.


Elissa
Mystik Hill Farm
Kearneysville, WV


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
